data.actual_result: Mini User Profile follows you into the different server
data.expected_result: Mini User Profile closes upon changing servers
data.short_description: Mini User Profile can follow into other servers & channels if opened along with the Role drop-down menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two servers where your Member List placement is the same (ideally at the top for easier reproduction) - Open your Mini User Profile from the Members List & then open the Role Add drop-down menu - Change to a server where your Member List placement is the same as the server you opened your Mini User Profile in
